name: LavEscape
description:
LavEscape is a game where you ave to run atop of platforms, and at the same time lava rises up to melt you. You are the blue cube.

WAD to move 

platforms are 1-way

movement is really fast, almost too fast, so you won't win by simply smashing your keyboard. think about where you're jumping.

if you want to get good at the game, practice. there is not other way to get good. just practice.
